publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 137
ab.l: Öźańĺari qatyna Baveĺniń anda olturduḥ daɣy jyladyḥ saɣynɣanymyzda Cijonnu.
Ki anda sordular biźd́ań jesir et́uv́č́uĺarimiź šira śoźĺariń da olǯalavčularymyz sordular bijańč́ śoźĺariń ajtadoɣoč šira oḥujuz biźǵa širasyn- dan Cijonnun.
T́ek ńecik šira oḥurbyz širasyn H-nyn jat jer üś- t́uńa.
Eǵer unutsam śeni e Jerušalajim unutulsun on qolum.
Jabušḥej tilim tanlajyma eǵer saɣynmasam śeni eǵer eś- ḱa almasam śeni e Jerušalajim bašlyɣynda bijańčimniń.
Saɣynɣyn e H ulanlaryna Edomnun zaval ḱuńuń Jerušalajimnin ol ajtuvčular ačyjyz ačyjyz v́eŕań et́ḿa any bunjatḥa dejiń.
Ǯymaty Baveĺniń ol talanɣan san bolur anar kim ki t́oĺaśa saja t́oĺav́ujńu ki t́oĺadij biźǵa.
Sandyr anar kim ki tutsa da jančsa jaš ulanlaryjny ol skalaɣa.
